verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: CHICAGO] -- [ARG1: Immigrant rights activists] [V: rallied] [ARGM-LOC: at Chicago 's Federal Plaza and in cities across the country] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] , [ARGM-PNC: to demand an end to the Trump Administration 's policy of separating mothers and children in immigration detention] .

CHICAGO -- [ARG0: Immigrant rights activists] rallied at Chicago 's Federal Plaza and in cities across the country Tuesday , to [V: demand] [ARG1: an end to the Trump Administration 's policy of separating mothers and children in immigration detention] .

CHICAGO -- Immigrant rights activists rallied at Chicago 's Federal Plaza and in cities across the country Tuesday , to demand an end to the Trump Administration 's policy of [V: separating] [ARG1: mothers and children] [ARGM-LOC: in immigration detention] .
